actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to require the Environmental Protection Agency to conduct a study for the purpose of developing procedures, methods, and other means for protecting against the wrongful use of cyanide, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to require recordkeeping at the retail level on sales of cyanide, including the identity and address of the purchaser and the intended use of such chemical. Requires the Administrator to study and report to the Congress on the manufacture and distribution of cyanide with a view toward taking actions necessary to safeguard the public from its wrongful use.

titles.title: A bill to require the Environmental Protection Agency to conduct a study for the purpose of developing procedures, methods, and other means for protecting against the wrongful use of cyanide, and for other purposes.
